items.content_html: Open fair-code platform on top of headless commerce. High performant Astro + Vue PWA & Jamstack storefront with built-in CMS. Integrations for payments, shipping, ERPs, CRMs and others. Truly extensible event-driven and serverless architecture. Easy and cheap deploy to Firebase.

Integrations for payments, shipping, ERPs, CRMs and others. Truly extensible event-driven and serverless architecture. Easy and cheap deploy to Firebase.

items.content_html: Learn by coding through a fun, project-based course full real-world design problems from front-end to back-end. You’ll build a music app with features like playlists, audio player, shuffle, and more! Use a modern stack of tools: React, Next.js, Typescript, and Postgres. Code reusable UI components, database schemas and migrations, API calls with serverless functions, and deploy it. Based on Scott Moss's course
items.title: DrakeAlia/spotify-app: Learn by coding through a fun, project-based course full real-world design problems from front-end to back-end. You’ll build a music app with features like playlists, audio player, shuffle, and more! Use a modern stack of tools: React, Next.js, Typescript, and Postgres. Code reusable UI components, database schemas and migrations, API calls with serverless functions, and deploy it. Based on Scott Moss's course
